Original title: The Monuments Men
Year: 2014
Duration: 118 min.
Country: United States
Directed by George Clooney
Writer: George Clooney, Grant Heslov (Novel: Robert Edsel)
Music: Alexandre Desplat
Photo: Phedon Papamichael
Starring: George Clooney, Matt Damon, Bill Murray, John Goodman, Cate Blanchett, Bob Balaban, Jean Dujardin, Hugh Bonneville, Dimitri Leonidas, Justus von DohnÃƒÂ¡nyi, Zahary Baharov, Serge Hazanavicius, Grant Heslov, Alexandre Desplat, Lee Asquith-Coe Nick Clooney
Studio: 20th Century Fox / Columbia Pictures / Smoke House / Studio Babelsberg
Genre: War. Drama. Action | World War II. Nazism. Painting. Based on a true story
Official Website: http://www.monumentsmen.es/

Synopsis:
---------
At the end of World War II (1939-1945), a select group of historians, museum directors and art experts, both British and American, are given the important and dangerous mission to retrieve artwork stolen by the Nazis during the war to return them to their rightful owners. It was an impossible mission: the works were well guarded and the German army had orders to destroy them as soon as the Reich fell. But those men in a race against time, risked their lives to prevent the destruction of thousands of years of human culture.
